name: dfs.namenode.storage.dir.perm
description:
Permissions for the directories on on the local filesystem where
      the DFS namenode stores the fsImage. The permissions can either be
      octal or symbolic.

name: ipc.server.purge.interval
description:
Define how often calls are cleaned up in the server.
    The default is 15 minutes. The unit is minutes.

name: dfs.datanode.lock-reporting-threshold-ms
description:
When thread waits to obtain a lock, or a thread holds a lock for
    more than the threshold, a log message will be written. Note that
    dfs.lock.suppress.warning.interval ensures a single log message is
    emitted per interval for waiting threads and a single message for holding
    threads to avoid excessive logging.

name: dfs.image.transfer.chunksize
description:
Chunksize in bytes to upload the checkpoint.
        Chunked streaming is used to avoid internal buffering of contents
        of image file of huge size.
        Support multiple size unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
        in dfs.blocksize.

name: dfs.datanode.available-space-volume-choosing-policy.balanced-space-threshold
description:
Only used when the dfs.datanode.fsdataset.volume.choosing.policy is set to
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset.AvailableSpaceVolumeChoosingPolicy.
    This setting controls how much DN volumes are allowed to differ in terms of
    bytes of free disk space before they are considered imbalanced. If the free
    space of all the volumes are within this range of each other, the volumes
    will be considered balanced and block assignments will be done on a pure
    round robin basis. Support multiple size unit suffix(case insensitive), as
    described in dfs.blocksize.

name: mapreduce.task.exit.timeout.check-interval-ms
description:
The interval in milliseconds between which the MR framework
  checks if task attempts stay in finishing state for too long.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client.max-retries
description:
The number of client retries to the RM/HS before
    throwing exception. This is a layer above the ipc.

name: dfs.namenode.list.encryption.zones.num.responses
description:
When listing encryption zones, the maximum number of zones
    that will be returned in a batch. Fetching the list incrementally in
    batches improves namenode performance.
